name: Easy Scripted Pages (ESP)
short_description: Easy Scripted Pages (or ESP) is a web technology that enables rapid creation of dynamic webpages. ESP uses the ECMAScript scripting language (also known as JavaScript) for dynamic content and can simply be embedded in the page like JSP and ASP.
